member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Controls.Notification.SfBusyIndicator
member.summary: Represents a control that allows the user to define when another program is in progress

remarks.para: The busy indicator control is an animation technique, used to enable the user to know that another process is in progress.
